In addition, the company offers molded plastic parts for medical equipment; and GPS parts, saxophones, compact disc and mechanical chassis parts, nursing care bed parts, and recaps. Its products are used in industrial electric equipment, information and telecommunication appliance, automobile, household appliance, housing equipment, and nursing care products. Sanko Gosei Ltd. was founded in 1940 and is headquartered in Nanto, Japan.

7894.F.summary: Maruto Sangyo Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells laminated films in Japan. The company engages in photogravure printing and bag making; photogravure cylinder making; and sale of paper packaging, packing paper, label stickers, plastic molding products and packing materials, packaging and industrial machinery, agricultural related materials, and horticultural equipment. It also imports and exports packaging materials; designs, constructs, and sells synthetic resin floor materials; installs machinery and appliances; plans, produces, and sells advertising; and provides package design and advertising agency services. Maruto Sangyo Co., Ltd. was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

7895.T.summary: Chuo Kagaku Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells disposable plastic food container products in Japan and internationally. The company offers a range of containers for sashimi, sushi, bento lunches, topped rice and noodles, side dishes, fruits and vegetables, and meat, as well as provides trays for food distribution. It also offers specialty containers for catering and hors d'oeuvres, as well as plates and cups, eggs, natto (fermented soybeans), and mini sauce bottles. The company was formerly known as Sanwa Plastics Industrial Co., Ltd. Chuo Kagaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1957 and is based in Konosu, Japan. Chuo Kagaku Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Mitsubishi Corporation.

7899.T.summary: MICS Chemical Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells functional laminated plastic films for vacuum food package, medical, and industrial applications in Japan. The company offers plastic multilayer and monolayer tube films. It also engages in the gravure printing and bag-making processing businesses; and the sale of other synthetic resin products. MICS Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Aichi, Japan.

7906.T.summary: YONEX Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of sporting goods in Japan. The company offers badminton and tennis equipment, including racquets, shuttlecocks, strings, apparel, shoes, bags, balls, etc.; and golf equipment, such as woods, irons, putters, shafts, apparel, shoes, bags, accessories, etc. It is also involved in golf course management activities. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7917.T.summary: Fujimori Kogyo Co., Ltd. provides packaging materials, medical/pharmaceutical packaging materials, and materials for the functional fields in Japan and internationally. It operates through Life Science, Information Electronics, and Building Materials segments. The company offers optoelectronic products, such as MASTACK TFB, a protection film for optical applications. It also provides electronic products, including MASTACK PC, a heat-resistant protection film; FILMBYNA, a release film for pharmaceutical patches, double-sided tapes, optical and other adhesion applications, electronic substrates, etc.; CLEAN PACK used for transfer between processes and transport of semiconductors and precision devices; and META-SEAL FILM, an adhesive film. In addition, the company offers single-use bags for bio-pharmaceutical production processes and microbiological cultures, plant culture bags, packaging materials for pharmaceutical products and medical instruments, PP packaging materials, chemical solution bags, liquid sticks, sealant materials, film separators, and double-structure aerosol systems. Further, it provides high-hermetic containers, refillable self-standing pouches, collapsible liquid containers, plastic film-lined liquid containers, single-use culture products, liquid-pouch packaging materials, packaging materials for retort sterilization, pouches with a spout, drum liners, and large-sized liquid transport containers. The company offers its products under the ZACROS brand name. Fujimori Kogyo Co., Ltd. was founded in 1914 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7923.T.summary: Toin Corporation manufactures and sells paper and plastic packaging products for food, confectionary, cosmetics, and pharmaceuticals markets. The company also offers packaging materials, and paper and resin packages; label products, including pressure-sensitive and glue, POP, and delayed labels; and leaflets/package inserts for pharmaceuticals and cosmetics. In addition, it provides glue, adhesive coating, and functional painting products for smartphones, semiconductors, storage media, building materials, etc. Further, the company imports and exports packaging products and raw materials; provides contract packaging services for quasi-pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and food products; offers advertising tools, such as paper display kits; and provides pulp mold, plastic bottles, and soft and blister packaging. Toin Corporation was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7932.T.summary: Nippi,Incorporated, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells collagen casings, gelatin and collagen peptides, cosmetics and functional foods, functional polymers, and life science products in Japan and internationally. The company offers collagen casings for use in various fields, including foods, medicines and pharmaceuticals, and cosmetics; gelatin, which is used in food products, pharmaceutical products, photo films, etc.; and leather products for the automotive industry. It also develops cosmetics and functional foods with collagen; offers Nippi Linker, a vinyl chloride resin, which is primarily used for electric wires and masking films; and provides Nippi V Foam, a foam made of vinyl chloride for welder processing that is used in cars, quilt products, and novelty goods. In addition, the company engages in real estate leasing activities; and provides life science products that include laminin, lab equipment and supplies, and reagents, as well as contract services and bovine spongiform encephalopathy test kits. The company was formerly known as The Japan Leather Mfg. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nippi,Incorporated in February 1974. Nippi,Incorporated was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7936.T.summary: ASICS Corporation manufactures and sells sports goods in Japan, the Americas, Europe, Oceania, Southeast and South Asia, and internationally. It offers sports shoes, apparel, and equipment. The company sells its products under the ASICS, ASICSTIGER, and Onitsuka Tiger brands through 989 retail stores, as well as through online. ASICS Corporation was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

7937.T.summary: Tsutsumi Jewelry Co.,Ltd. engages in manufacturing, wholesaling, and retailing jewelry primarily in Japan. It offers jewelry design, as well as reconditioning and repair of pre-owned jewelry. The company also operates precious stone trading centers in the United States, Belgium, Israel, India, and Thailand. It operates 173 specialty jewelry retail stores in Japan. The company was formerly known as Tsutsumi Precious Metals and Crafts Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tsutsumi Jewelry Co., Ltd. in April 1988. Tsutsumi Jewelry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Warabi, Japan.

7938.T.summary: Regal Corporation manufactures, retails, wholesales, and repairs various types of shoes for men and women. It also sells its products online. The company was formerly known as Nippon Shoe Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Regal Corporation in October 1990. Regal Corporation was founded in 1902 and is headquartered in Urayasu, Japan.

7944.T.summary: Roland Corporation manufactures, markets, imports, and exports electronic musical instruments, electronic equipment, and software in Japan. The company offers digital pianos, organs, synthesizers, keyboards, guitars and bass, drums and percussions, production equipment, amplifiers, AIRA modulars, DJ controllers, grooveboxes, professional A/V products, accessories, and apps, as well as cloud services. It also provides OEM/ODM/consulting and repair services; and operates music schools, as well as online stores. Roland Corporation was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

7951.T.summary: Yamaha Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the musical instruments, audio equipment, and other businesses worldwide. The company manufactures and sells pianos; digital musical instruments; wind, string, and percussion instruments; other music-related products; and produces and sells audio and visual media software, as well as manages music and other schools. It also provides professional audio equipment, music production equipment and software, audiovisual equipment, commercial online karaoke systems, network devices, and unified communication devices. In addition, the company offers electronic devices, automobile interior wood components, factory automation equipment, and golf products; and operates resorts. Yamaha Corporation was founded in 1887 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

7952.T.long_name: Kawai Musical Instruments Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
7952.T.summary: Kawai Musical Instruments Manufacturing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells musical instruments under the Kawai brand. It offers acoustic and digital piano instruments. The company also develops and sells computer music software, as well as software for small businesses; promotes music appreciation through lectures and concerts; and manufactures and sells precision metals, wood products, and electronic devices. In addition, it operates music and physical education schools; and learning centers in China, Taiwan, and Indonesia. Kawai Musical Instruments Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

7955.T.summary: Cleanup Corporation manufactures and sells kitchen and bath equipment, washstand fixtures, commercial kitchen equipment, and other household equipment and devices in Japan and internationally. The company offers kitchen equipment, such as kitchens, sinks, work cabinets, cabinets for gas stoves, wall and storage cabinets, gas stoves, range hoods, gas and oven ranges, microwave ovens, fridge-freezers, dishwasher/dryers, and dish dryers; bath equipment, including system bathrooms, and artificial marble and stainless steel bathtubs; and washstand fixtures comprising system and shampoo washstands/vanities, and washstand storage cabinets. It also provides commercial kitchen equipment, such as sinks, cooking worktables, cupboards, culinary training tables, heating equipment, dishwashers, fridge-freezers, and rice cookers; and other household equipment and devices. The company offers its products through approximately 102 showrooms primarily under the CENTRO and STEDIA brands. Cleanup Corporation was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7959.T.summary: Oliver Corporation manufactures and sells general interior furniture products in Japan and internationally. The company offers sofa and lobby chairs; chairs; tables; exterior, kids related, and reception/office furniture; and cabinet, equipment, and other facilities. It markets its products for medical and elderly, corporate/welfare, station/airport/public, spa and hot bath, educational, hotel/ryokan/accommodation, bridal ,cafe, restaurant, and others facilities. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7965.T.summary: Zojirushi Corporation manufactures and sells household products in Japan and internationally. Its products include cooking appliances, such as rice cookers, electronic pots, hot plates, grills, coffee makers, toaster ovens, induction heating cookers, home bakery appliances, and other products; and household and thermal products, including vacuum bottles, stainless steel pots, portable gas ranges, drink dispensers for use in hotels and restaurants, thermally insulated pitchers, and other products. The company also provides household appliances, such as air cleaners, humidifiers, dish dryers, bedding dryers, and other products; and industrial machinery products. Zojirushi Corporation was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

7972.T.summary: Itoki Corporation manufactures and sells office and equipment-related products and services in Japan and internationally. The company offers workstation systems, desks, low partitions, office and conference room chairs, tables, related maintenance services, etc.; office building internal materials, movable and fixed walls, security equipment, factory and logistics equipment, commercial facility equipment, research facility equipment, etc.; and study desks and chairs, study and small office/home office furniture, etc. It also provides furniture and other products for healthcare facilities; bookshelf, auto racks, and find picker products for public facilities; safety deposit boxes and vault doors for financial institutions; and distribution equipment for factories and logistics facilities. The company offers its products under joyten brand name. Itoki Corporation was founded in 1890 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7981.T.summary: Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells enameled products. The company offers enameled system kitchens, wood system kitchens, enamel system baths, enameled washstands, sink units, heating appliances, hot water heaters, enameled wall covering materials, and other home appliances and equipment. It primarily sells its products through a network of 172 showrooms in Japan. The company was formerly known as Nippon Enamel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. in 1971. Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

7988.T.summary: Nifco Inc. manufactures and sells industrial plastic parts and components in Japan, rest of Asia, North America, and Europe. It offers automotive parts and components for use in fuel, engine, exterior, interiors, and electric powertrain. The company also offers household equipment, such as drawer closers, push latches, earthquake-proof latches, and door dampers; consumer electronics/office automation products that include dampers, free-stop hinges, magnet latches, and push latches; and fashion/sport products, such as side release buckles, cord locks, and other buckles. In addition, it manufactures and sells beds, as well as imports and sells furniture products. The company was formerly known as Japan Industry Fastener Inc. and changed its name to Nifco Inc. in December 1970. Nifco Inc. was incorporated in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7989.T.summary: Tachikawa Corporation, together with its subsidiary, designs, manufactures, markets, sells, and installs various window covering products and room partitions primarily in Japan. The company offers vertical blinds, roller blinds, roman shades, pleated shades, curtain rails, and other window coverings and interior finishing products for residential and office buildings, as well as public facilities. It is also involved in the manufacture and sale of parking systems, geared motors, motorized panel louvers, and movable partitions. The company was formerly known as Tachikawa Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tachikawa Corporation in October 1947. The company was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7990.T.summary: Globeride, Inc. manufactures and sells sports and leisure products worldwide. It offers fishing products, such as reels, rods, apparel, cooler boxes, and specialty items under the DAIWA brand; golf products under the ONOFF, DAIWA GIII, RODDIO, and Fourteen brands; products for sports, including tennis, badminton, squash, etc. under the Prince brand; and sports bicycles under the corratec, FOCUS, and BOTTECHIA brands, as well as handles, seats, tires, and other items under the WTB, iTM, and other brands. The company was incorporated in 1945 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7997.T.summary: Kurogane Kosakusho Ltd. manufactures and sells furniture for office work, facilities, home, and residential use. The company also manufactures and sells air conditioning and clean-room-related equipment. In addition, it manufactures and installs custom-made interiors and construction-related equipment. The company was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8005.T.summary: Scroll Corporation primarily engages in the mail-order and e-commerce businesses in Japan. The company's mail-order business offers fashionable items for working women; casual items for adults; items for everyday activities, such as yoga, walking, and swimming; shoes, bags, and accessories; and undergarments and nightwear for women and their families. Its e-commerce business provides cosmetics; bags, wallets, watches, and accessories; beauty and diet products, and health related goods; interior furniture, sundries, and storage goods; frill and lace sleeping gears, and curtains; and fishing gears, camping equipment, outdoor equipment, disaster stockpiles items, and preserved food. In addition, the company offers skin care products, health and beauty products for woman, health food products, and make-up products; and logistics services. Further, it provides B2B solutions for e-commerce and mail order/online shopping business providers; and domestic travel, as well as travel planning and operations services covering one-day sightseeing bus tours, ski tours, and bus tours for foreign tourists visiting Japan. The company was formerly known as Mutow Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Scroll Corporation in October 2009. Scroll Corporation was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

8008.T.summary: Yondoshi Holdings Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the planning, manufacture, wholesale, and retail of jewelry, apparel, bags, and other products in Japan and internationally. The company offers jewelry products primarily under the 4C, 4C BRIDAL, Canal4C, and EAUDOUCE 4C brands. It also plans, designs, and manufactures men's and women's wear; and imports interior products and other products. In addition, the company engages in the small and medium-sized general merchandising business; operation of fashion specialty stores located primarily in the Chugoku and Kyushu areas; development and production of fashion buildings; real estate leasing activities; provision of distribution support services; and export and import of bags. Further, it is involved in managing a network of apparel specialty stores under PALLET brand; and the management of ladies casual wear shops under the LOU name. The company was formerly known as F&A Aqua Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Yondoshi Holdings Inc. in September 2013. Yondoshi Holdings Inc. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8011.T.summary: Sanyo Shokai Ltd. manufactures and sells men's and women's clothes and accessories through department stores, specialty stores, and directly managed stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8013.T.summary: Naigai Co.,Ltd. plans, manufactures, wholesales, imports, and exports textile products. It offers men's, ladies, and children's socks, panty stockings, etc. The company was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8016.T.summary: Onward Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells men's, women's, and children's apparel, accessories, and other products in Japan, Europe, Asia, and the United States. The company operates through Apparel Business and Lifestyle Business segments. It offers uniforms, jewelry, accessories, health-related and cosmetic products, gift items, gift catalogs, and sales promotion goods; pet supplies, and other product lines; stage, theater, and ballet supplies; inner wear and related products; and sports shoes, leather goods, dance supplies, and luxury and fashion products. The company also engages in the planning, designing, and constructing of commercial, cultural, and environmental facilities; promotion of art and culture; planning and production of advertising and promotional materials; management, purchase, sale, and rental of real estate; import, export, and sale of cosmetic products; retail and wholesale of clothing products and bags; operation of stores; and operation and management of Lakeland Country Club and Talofofo Golf Club, as well as hotels and resort facilities. In addition, it is involved in the provision of management consultation, and property and life insurance agency services; and apparel sales, restaurant management, digital marketing, and IT solutions businesses. The company offers its products primarily under the GRACE CONTINENTAL, JIL SANDER, JOSEPH, J. PRESS, Nijyusanku, ICB, KASHIYAMA, Jiyuku, and other brands. It provides its products through department stores, as well as through e-commerce stores. The company was formerly known as Onward Kashiyama Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Onward Holdings Co., Ltd. in 2007. Onward Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8018.T.summary: Sankyo Seiko Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, production, import, and export of apparel products in Japan and internationally. The company provides nightwear and sleeping products, and interior accessories; and ladies, men's, and junior apparel products, as well as supplies textiles and other fabrics. It is also involved in the real estate leasing business, including the rental of offices, stores, and halls. In addition, the company engages in the brand licensing business. It offers its products under the DAKS and Leonard brand names. Sankyo Seiko Co., Ltd. was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8022.T.summary: Mizuno Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells sporting goods in Japan and internationally. The company offers products for golf clubs; baseball gloves; running shoes; shoes for football and rugby players, as well as for trekking; volleyball uniforms and shoes; table tennis wear and shoes; handball shoes; skating suits; footwear and apparel for curling; and uniforms for ski jumping, as well as goods for judo. It also manages sports facilities. The company was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8025.T.summary: Tsukamoto Corporation Co., Ltd. engages in the clothing business. The company processes, manufactures, and sells men's apparel and uniforms. It also offers health and beauty products, home lifestyle products, home appliances, household goods, and water treatment products; and information solutions. The company was formerly known as Tsukamoto Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tsukamoto Corporation Co., Ltd. in 2003. Tsukamoto Corporation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1812 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8040.T.summary: Tokyo Soir Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and wholesale of women's formal wear and accessories in Japan. It offers black and color formal wear, and ceremony suit. The company sells its products through department stores, chain stores, and online. Tokyo Soir Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8101.T.summary: GSI Creos Corporation provides textile, industrial, and nanotechnology products worldwide. It sells functional materials used in innerwear's, stockings, sweaters, etc.; deals in synthetic and natural fibers to manufacture printed and jacquard fabrics, as well as textiles used in ladies' and men's wear, outdoor sportswear, etc.; and designs, manufactures, and markets men's and ladies' wear, innerwear, legwear, outerwear, etc. under the Mashu Kashu brand. The company also imports and exports raw materials for specialty coatings, paint and coatings, and personal care products, as well as other products comprising packaging films, industrial films and functional films etc.; supplies cutting-edge semiconductor equipment and materials, and composite machinery and materials, etc.; designs, manufactures, and sells hobby materials under GSI Creos brand. In addition, it develops applications for nano carbons in a range of products in various fields, such as paints and coating materials, fuel cells, and composite materials. The company was formerly known as Gunze Sangyo, Inc. and changed its name to GSI Creos Corporation in 2001. GSI Creos Corporation was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8105.T.summary: Marushohotta Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells apparels in Japan. It designs twisted yarns; mattress, feather and wool futon, and health products; decorations, jewelry, and loading and small items; and home fashion, women's clothing, baby and kids' clothes, etc. The company was founded in 1861 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Marushohotta Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of RIZAP Group Co., Ltd.

8107.T.summary: Kimuratan Corporation plans, produces, and sells baby and children's clothing in Japan. The company offers its products under the n.o.u.s, Love, Coeur a Coeur, Piccolo, Biquette Club, La Chaive, Lily ivory, dolcina, Bobson, and Biquette brands. It is also involved in the store management and childcare management operations. The company was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

8114.T.summary: Descente Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells sportswear and related products in Japan and internationally. It offers outdoor, swimming, winter sports, golf, soccer/futsal, cycling, tennis, volleyball, baseball, running/walking, and training/fitness wear products under the DESCENTE, le coq sportif, arena, Munsingwear, umbro, Inov-8, SKINS, Marmot, LANVIN SPORT, CUTTER & BUCK, SRIXON, AVIA, and ryka brand names. The company was founded in 1935 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8115.T.summary: Moonbat Co.,Ltd. engages in the planning, manufacture, import, purchase, and sale of umbrellas, clothing, fur, leather, jewelry, and hats in Japan. The company was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

8119.T.summary: Sanyei Corporation engages in the wholesale and retail of furniture and houseware, fashion accessories, and home appliances in Japan and internationally. The company offers furniture, such as beds and tables, as well as housewares comprising pots and tableware under the MINT and Villeroy & Bochb brands; fashion accessories, such as trolley luggage products, pouches, bags, and shoes under the BIRKENSTOCK and Kipling brand names; and beauty and kitchen appliances the Vitantonio, mod's hair, and MULTI CHEF brands. It also provides pets, pet products, transport materials, and industrial goods under the Pepica brand; iron pots under the CHASSEUR brand; cast-aluminum cookware under the WOLL brand name; watches under the KERBHOLZ brand; and home appliances under the ION-Sei brand name. In addition, the company operates a boutique under the Quorinest name, which offers various apparel and accessories; and pet salons and animal clinics. Further, the company provides logistic services, including product planning, development, and delivery services; and after sales services, as well as manufactures home appliances. The company was formerly known as SANYEI Boeki and changed its name to Sanyei Corporation in 1971. Sanyei Corporation was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8123.T.summary: T.Kawabe & Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, imports, and exports handkerchiefs, scarves, mufflers, towels, and fabric products in Japan. The company also processes, imports, exports, and sells chemical textile and general textile products, textile fabric, clothing accessories, upholstery, furniture, and bedding products. In addition, it is involved in clothing design, and planning and consulting of interior decoration; sale, lease, and intermediation of the real estate properties; and manufacture and sale of cosmetics, perfumes, soaps, and pharmaceutical and non-pharmaceutical products. The company was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. As of January 25, 2021, T.Kawabe & Co., Ltd. is subsidiary of ICHIHIRO CO.,LTD.

8127.T.summary: Yamato International Inc. plans, manufactures, and sells apparel products focusing on casual wear in Japan. It offers its products under the Crocodile, Crocodile Ladies, Switch motion, Crocodile Sports, Crocodile chic, Crocodile Three Days, CITERA, Penfield, and Lighting Bolt brands. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8130.T.summary: Sangetsu Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells interior decorating products in China and internationally. The company's products include wallcoverings, flooring materials, curtains, and upholstery products. It operates showrooms in Shinagawa, Nagoya, Fukuoka, Osaka, Sendai, Kanazawa, Hiroshima, and Okinawa. The company was formerly known as Sangetsudoshoten Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sangetsu Corporation in 1970. Sangetsu Corporation was founded in 1849 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

8135.T.summary: Zett Corporation manufactures, sells, imports, and exports sports equipment in Japan. The company offers baseballs, basketball wear, bats, and other apparel products. It also operates Alcanet, an online ordering system to search and order products from approximately 3,000 dealers. The company was formerly known as Watanabe Corporation and changed its name to Zett Corporation in 1980. Zett Corporation was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8136.T.summary: Sanrio Company, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, plans, designs, and sells social communication gifts, greeting cards, and books in Japan and internationally. The company also operates restaurants; and produces, promotes, and distributes movies. In addition, it engages in the production and sale of videos and DVDs; planning and presentation of musicals and live performances; copyright licensing activities; and planning and operation of theme parks. Sanrio Company, Ltd. was incorporated in 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8139.T.summary: Nagahori Corporation engages in the manufacture, import, export, and sale of gemstones, pearls, and precious metals in Japan and internationally. The company also offers a range of jewelry items, including fashion accessories and high-end label products. It serves department stores, specialty stores, and distributors. Nagahori Corporation was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8143.T.summary: Lapine Co., Ltd. engages in the produces, wholesales, and retails fashion apparel for women under the LAPINE brand in Japan. The company was formerly known as Daito Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lapine Co., Ltd. in April 1967. Lapine Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is based in Osaka, Japan.

8160.T.summary: Kisoji Co., Ltd. operates a chain of restaurants and taverns in Japan. Its restaurants offer shabu-shabu and Japanese cuisine, chicken dishes, grilled meat, wine, and Kyushu cuisine. The company was formerly known as Matsuba Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kisoji Co., Ltd. in February 1974. Kisoji Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

8165.T.summary: Senshukai Co., Ltd. engages in the mail order, bridal, and corporate businesses in Japan. The company provides lifestyle products in various genres through catalogs, as well as Belle Maison Net. online shop; and products and services to corporations through catalogue sales. It also offers credit cards and insurance products; and manufacture products using natural water from Hokuto City. In addition, the company operates house wedding style wedding ceremony facilities; and 11 child daycare facilities in Tokyo and the Chiba Prefecture, and Osaka. Senshukai Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1946 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8168.T.summary: Keiyo Co., Ltd. operates and manages a chain of home center stores in Japan. The company's home center stores offer hardware, tools, wood and building materials, paints, gardening products, garden plants, automotive related goods, leisure goods, pet products, soft and hard furnishings, kitchen supplies and tableware, bathroom products, cleaning goods, clothing products, household goods, health and beauty goods, curtains, lightning and household electronics, home electronics, and medicines. As of February 28, 2019, it operated a network of 177 stores. The company was formerly known as Keiyo Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Keiyo Co., Ltd. in April 1979. Keiyo Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

8173.T.summary: Joshin Denki Co., Ltd. engages in the sale, delivery, installation, maintenance, and repair of home appliances, information and communication equipment, entertainment products, and housing equipment and related products. It operates through a network of 239 stores and 24 service centers in Japan. The company was formerly known as Joshin Denki Sangyo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Joshin Denki Co., Ltd. in April 1958. Joshin Denki Co., Ltd. was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8179.T.summary: Royal Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates a chain of restaurants in Japan. It operates through Restaurant Business, Contract Food Service, In-Flight Catering Business, Hotel Business, and Food Manufacturing segments. The company operates restaurants under various brands, including the Royal Host; the TENDON TENYA, a tempura and tempura rice bowl restaurant; the Cowboy Family that provides salad bar, steak, and hamburgers; the Sizzler, a grill restaurant; and the Shakey's, a pizza restaurant. It also operates specialty restaurants under the Hananoki, Royal Garden Cafe, Pinkberry, The 3rd Cafe, and Rose Bakery names, as well as a hotel under the Richmond Hotel brand. In addition, the company operates restaurants and retail shops at airports, highways, department stores, convention centers, offices, hospitals, etc. Further, it produces sweets, breads, and sweet potatoes desserts; frozen cakes breads and dressings; and Halal products, as well as provides in-flight catering services. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8181.T.summary: Totenko Co., Ltd. operates restaurants and banquet halls in Japan. The company offers food and drinks for weddings and other events, as well as for season banquets. It operates 20 stores. The company was formerly known as Ueno Kanko Onsen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Totenko Co., Ltd. in May 1961. Totenko Co., Ltd. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8185.T.summary: Chiyoda Co., Ltd. engages in the retail of shoes, etc. It develops, manufactures, and sells shoes; and clothing products ranging from innerwear to legwear for men, women, and kids. As of June 30, 2020, the company operated 1,031 stores under the SHOE PLAZA, TSRC, CHIYODA HAKI-GOKOCHI, Chiyoda, cloverleaf, SPC, SHOE PLAZA park, SHOES Paletta, VifVif by cloverleaf, COURIPIE, and NATURA store names. Chiyoda Co., Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8186.T.summary: Otsuka Kagu, Ltd. provides furniture and interior products in Japan. It offers sofas, dining chairs and tables, bed mattresses, living tables, TV boards, book shelves, shelves, cupboards, storage furniture, desks/desk chairs, study desks, kids furniture, personal and reclining products, curtains, illuminations, carpets and rugs, beddings, interior and outlet goods, and reworth products. The company offers its products through retail stores and online. Otsuka Kagu, Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8200.T.summary: Ringer Hut Co., Ltd. operates restaurants in Japan and internationally. It operates approximately 800 stores under the Nagasaki Champon Ringer Hut, Tonkatsu Bonito, and Nagasaki Takumi Hamakatsu brands. The company was formerly known as Hamakatsu Corporation and changed its name to Ringer Hut Co., Ltd. in August 1982. Ringer Hut Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8202.T.summary: Laox CO., LTD. operates a network of general tax free stores in Japan. It is also involved in inbound, global, life and fashion, and entertainment businesses. The company's inbound business provides various products, such as cosmetics, household products, electric home appliances, and health foods, as well as engages in online retailing for domestic customers. Its global business is involved in cross-border electronic commerce and foreign trade businesses; and the operation of a restaurant guide application for tourists. The company's life and fashion business manufactures and sells women's shoes, and gift-related products at physical and online stores. Its entertainment business operates restaurants and entertainment facilities; manages and operates cultural events; develops commercial facilities; manages events and businesses in commercial facilities; and provides real property management services. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Laox CO., LTD. is a subsidiary of Suning.Com Co., Ltd.

8208.T.summary: Encho Co.,Ltd. operates stores in Japan. Its stores offer lumber, construction materials, gardening supplies, pains, glues and adhesives, power tools, carpenter's tools, metal materials for construction, interior materials, electrical equipment, lamps, automobile parts, miscellaneous goods, stationery, bicycles, and leisure goods. The company is also involved in the house remodeling business. The company was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Fuji, Japan.

8209.T.summary: Friendly Corporation develops and operates a chain of family restaurants in the Kansai area, Japan. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Daito, Japan. As of June 11, 2018, Friendly Corporation operates as a subsidiary of Joyfull Co., Ltd..

8214.T.summary: AOKI Holdings Inc. engages in the fashion, anniversary and bridal, and entertainment businesses in Japan. It creates and sells apparel for men and women, as well as business apparel, casual clothing, and accessories under the AOKI and ORIHICA brand names; and operates apparel store in name of Size MAX for big sizes casual clothing for men and women. The company also operates wedding halls and guesthouse-style halls for ceremonies and receptions, as well as offers related products and services. In addition, it operates and manages Cote d'Azur karaoke facilities; KAIKATSU CLUB caf complexes; and FiT24 amenities and training areas. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

8215.T.summary: Ginza Yamagataya Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells clothing for men and women in Japan. It operates 30 clothing stores. The company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8217.T.summary: Okuwa Co., Ltd. operates supermarkets in Japan. Its stores offer groceries, liquor, rice, household products, upholstery, DIY, leisure goods, sports products, household appliances, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and clothing products. As of March 1, 2020, it operated 159 stores in Wakayama, Osaka, Nara, Mie, Hyogo, Aichi, Gifu, and Shizuoka. The company also operates in online shopping business. Okuwa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Wakayama, Japan.

8218.T.summary: Komeri Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of home improvement stores in Japan. The company's stores offer hard merchandise, such as tools, hardware, and building materials; and green merchandise, including green plants and gardening/farming materials. As of March 31, 2019, it operated 1,192 stores comprising 64 Powers, 164 Homecenters, 956 Hard and Greens, and 8 Athenas. The company was formerly known as Komeri Showten Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Komeri Co.,Ltd. in January 1973. Komeri Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Niigata, Japan.

8219.T.summary: Aoyama Trading Co., Ltd. engages in business wear, casual wear, credit card, printing and media, sundry sales, repair service, and other businesses in Japan and internationally. The company offers business wear, such as suits, jackets, slacks, coats, formal wear, and other clothing items; and casual wear, such as jeans. It also issues and manages credit cards, as well as provides small-amount finance; offers a range of sales promotion services, including distributing flyers and direct mails; and publishes magazines. In addition, the company provides repair services for shoes and key duplication under the Mister Minit brand; sells daily merchandise and processed foods; and operates restaurants and fitness gyms. Further, it operates in the web media business. As of March 31, 2020, the company operated 809 Yofuku-no-Aoyama stores; 56 The Suit Company stores; 9 Universal Language stores; 8 White The Suit Company stores; 5 Universal Language Measure's stores; and 30 Aoyama Suits stores. It also operated 12 LEVI'S stores; 15 2nd STREET stores; 2 JUMBLE STORE stores; 100 Yen shop Daiso stores and 6 WTW stores for sundry and interior products; and 35 Yakiniku King restaurants, 11 Yuzu An restaurants, and 1 Anytime Fitness center for gyms. Aoyama Trading Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8225.T.summary: Takachiho Co.,Ltd. engages in the wholesale and retail of tourism souvenirs in Japan. The company provides fishing tackles and outdoor goods through retail stores; and insurance services, as well as offers gift goods. It also manufactures confectionery products and tourist souvenirs; leases real estate properties; and manages public baths and restaurants. Takachiho Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan.

8227.T.summary: SHIMAMURA Co., Ltd. operates stores in Japan and Taiwan. Its stores provide clothing and fashion-related products, food-related products, and housing-related products. The company was incorporated in 1953 and is headquartered in Saitama, Japan.

8230.T.summary: Hasegawa Co., Ltd. sells Buddhist altars and altar fittings in Japan. The company is also involved in tombstone and indoor graveyard businesses; and the restoration of main halls. It operates a total of 132 stores, which include 26 stores in West Japan area, 96 stores in Kanto area, and 10 stores in Tokai area. Hasegawa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Fukuoka City, Japan.

8233.T.summary: Takashimaya Company, Limited engages in the operation of department stores. Its department stores offer an array of products, including select brand items, clothing, personal items, household goods, groceries, and miscellaneous goods. The company is involved in the development and operation of shopping centers, restaurants, and cafes; provision design and interior decoration services for retail or cultural facilities; and credit card, shopping card, advertising agency, and e-commerce fashion businesses. In addition, it provides personnel services and solutions, including dispatching personnel, outsourcing, and training; wholesale and retail of liquor; event planning services; and building maintenance services. Takashimaya Company, Limited was founded in 1831 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8237.T.summary: Matsuya Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Ginza and Asakusa, Japan. Its department stores provide women's fashion products, cosmetics, fragrances, and watch and jewelry; men's fashion and sports products; children's wear and goods; and household goods. It also engages in mail order and related manufacturing, import/export, and wholesale businesses. Matsuya Co., Ltd. was founded in 1869 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8242.T.summary: H2O Retailing Corporation operates department stores, supermarkets, and shopping centers in Japan. It operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Supermarket Business, Shopping Centre Business, and Other Businesses. The Department Store Business segment sells clothing, accessories, home furnishings, foods, and other products. The Supermarket Business segment operates general merchandise stores and supermarkets; and produces food products. The Shopping Centre Business segment provides rental management services for commercial facilities and building maintenance services. The Other Businesses segment engages in the hotel, remodeling, home delivery, membership management, temporary staffing, eating and drinking establishments, information processing, and other business activities. The company also manufactures and sells laver seaweed, prepared food, bread, dried foods, and furniture and furnishings; produces organic farm products; and sells apparel, toys, personal care products, uniforms, pet-accessories, furniture and interior goods, and electronic gift certificates. In addition, it engages in the planning, production management, and sale of women's apparel; data processing and systems development, book-keeping and payroll calculation, quality testing and consulting, and foreign trade activities; and management of internet shopping site, caf, company cafeteria, and restaurants. Further, the company operates salons for bridal use; and offers manpower dispatching and employment agency services. Additionally, it provides property management and development services. The company was formerly known as Hankyu Department Stores, Inc. and changed its name to H2O Retailing Corporation in October 2007. H2O Retailing Corporation was founded in 1929 and is based in Osaka, Japan.

8244.T.summary: Kintetsu Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1920 and is based in Osaka, Japan. Kintetsu Department Store Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Kintetsu Group Holdings Co., Ltd.

8247.T.summary: Daiwa Co.,Ltd. operates departmental stores in Japan. It operates through Kohrinbo and Toyama stores. The company was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Kanazawa, Japan.

8254.T.summary: Saikaya Department Store Co.,Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1872 and is headquartered in Kawasaki, Japan.

8255.T.summary: Axial Retailing Inc. operates a chain of supermarkets in Japan. It operates a network of 129 stores. The company was formerly known as Harashin Narus Holdings Co Ltd. and changed its name to Axial Retailing Inc. in October 2013. Axial Retailing Inc. was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Nagaoka, Japan.

8256.T.summary: Marumitsu Co., Ltd. engages in the clothing wholesale business in Japan. The company sells clothing, bedding, interiors, clothing goods, etc.; color depositing shampoo/heat care products; and antibody detection and micro blood collection kits. It also operates retail stores for sale of men's clothing under the Kent House brand; develops B to B platform; and deals in live performance promotional goods, and artist-branding related goods. The company was founded in 1900 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8260.T.summary: Izutsuya Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Kitakyushu, Japan.

8267.T.summary: Aeon Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry in Japan and internationally. It operates through General Merchandise Store (GMS) Business, Supermarket (SM) Business, Health & Wellness Business, Financial Services Business, Shopping Center Development Business, Services & Specialty Store Business, and International Business segments. The GMS Business segment operates general merchandise stores. The SM Business segment operates supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-scale stores. The Health & Wellness Business segment operates drugstores and dispensing pharmacies. The Financial Services Business segment provides integrated financial services, including credit, banking, insurance, and e-money card services, as well as credit cards. The Shopping Center Development Business segment develops and operates shopping centers. The Services & Specialty Store Business segment offers various services, as well as operates specialty stores. The International Business segment operates general merchandise and discount stores, and supermarkets in China and the ASEAN countries. Aeon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

8273.T.summary: Izumi Co., Ltd. operates a chain of stores in Japan. The company operates shopping centers under the Youme Town name; neighborhood shopping centers under the Youme Mall name; and food supermarkets under the Youme Mart name. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 197 stores, including 68 shopping centers, 117 supermarkets, 3 neighborhood shopping centers, and 9 other stores. The company was incorporated in 1942 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

8276.T.summary: Heiwado Co.,Ltd. engages in the retailing of food, clothing, and housing related products in Japan. It operates 154 stores, including 74 stores in Shiga; 6 stores in Fukui; 7 stores in Ishikawa; 2 stores in Toyama; 18 stores in Kyoto; 21 stores in Osaka; 3 stores in Hyogo; 7 stores in Gifu; and 16 stores in Aichi. The company also operates 9 shops comprising 7 in Shigaa and 2 in Kyoto. Heiwado Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1948 and is based in Hikone, Japan.

8281.T.summary: Xebio Holdings Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in sporting goods business in Japan. The company is involved in sporting goods retail activities, as well as the sale of sporting goods and apparels. It operates integrated mega specialty stores under The Super Sports XEBIO brand; small and medium scale sporting equipment specialty stores under the XEBIO Sports Express brand; urban sporting goods specialty stores under the Victoria brand; small-scale sporting goods stores under the NEXAS brand; sporting goods specialty stores under the Takeda Sports brand; golf products specialty stores under the Victoria Golf and Golf Partner brands; outdoor specialty stores under the L-Breath brand; and specialty apparel stores under the next and X'tyle brands. The company also operates sports eyewear stores under the X'tyleVision brand; health food and fitness, and medical products stores under the Xiasis brand; Free Blades, an ice hockey club team; Xebio Arena, a sports arena; and sports community station stores under the XSPOT brand. In addition, it engages in purchase and sale of golf goods; marketing project, research and consulting, event promotion, and property management activities; and international business, and research and development operations. Further, the company is involved in providing sports related digital platforms; and e-commerce management business. Additionally, it engages in sales agency business, human resource development, and temporary staffing service; and credit card business. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Koriyama, Japan.

8291.T.long_name: Nissan Tokyo Sales Holdings Co., Ltd.
8291.T.summary: Nissan Tokyo Sales Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the automobile dealership business in Japan. It is involved in the Nissan and Renault car sales, maintenance, and parts supplies and sales activities; purchase and sale of used cars; sports car rental business; and vehicle inspection, race management, system solution, vehicle transport, registration agency, and taxi businesses. The company also offers general and life insurance agency services; and plans, develops, and sells campers. In addition, it operates a sports car main portal site. Nissan Tokyo Sales Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1942 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8298.T.summary: Family Inc. engages in the retail of imported new cars and used cars in Japan. It is also involved in the sale of car supplies and parts; car rental and maintenance, and metal sheet painting activities; and non-life insurance agency, solar power generation, and condominium leasing businesses. The company offers products and services through its network of 30 stores. Family Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

8904.T.summary: Avantia Co.,Ltd. engages in the custom-build housing business in Japan. It involved in the planning, design, construction, interior coordination, and exterior design of houses; detached housing business; residential land development and sale; remodeling business; development business; residential land development business; condominium business; and brokerage business. The company was formerly known as Sanyo Housing Nagoya Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Avantia Co.,Ltd. in January 2020. Avantia Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

8917.T.summary: First Juken Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and sale of detached houses in Japan. The company also provides subcontracting work and related services; and construction consulting services. In addition, it offers real estate sales, brokerage, placement, rental, and management services; and non-life insurance agency and life insurance solicitation services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Amagasaki, Japan.

8920.T.summary: Tosho Co., Ltd. engages in sports club, hotel, and real estate businesses in Japan. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Anjo, Japan.

9085.S.summary: Hokkaido Chuo Bus Co., Ltd. provides passenger car transportation services in Japan. It is also involved in real estate, restaurant, hotel, and public bath businesses. The company was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Otaru, Japan.

9263.T.summary: Visionaryholdings Co.,Ltd. engages in the sale of eyeglasses, contact lenses and accessories, hearing aids, etc. It operates 374 stores. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9266.T.summary: Ikka Dining Project., Ltd. engages in dinning and wedding business in Japan. The company is also involved in bridal business. As of March 31, 2020, it managed 69 stores; and a wedding facility. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9268.T.summary: Optimus Group Company Limited engages in the vehicle trading business. Its Trading segment buys used vehicles through auction houses and exports them to local car dealers worldwide. The company's Logistics segment is involved in the transportation of used cars from Japan to overseas. Its Service segment provides auto financing loans; and on-site pre-vehicle inspection maintenance services. The company's Inspection segment provides pre-shipment inspection of used cars, imported vehicles, and domestic vehicle inspections. Optimus Group Company Limited was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9270.T.summary: Valuence Holdings Inc. engages in the purchase, auction, and sale of reusable products. It provides branded goods, antiques, precious metals, and other products. The company offers its products through stores and online in Japan. It also engages in real estate brokerage, app and systems development, and other related businesses. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9271.T.summary: Wagokoro Co., Ltd. engages in retail, services, and OEM businesses in Japan. The company operates Japanese accessories stores; and sells its products through mail order sites. It also rents Kimono; and manufacture and sells silver accessories, stone bracelets, sunglasses/glasses, buckles, hats, jewelry, umbrella, leather products, and chopsticks. The company operates 67 stores. Wagokoro Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9272.T.summary: Boutiques, Inc. engages in e-commerce, exhibition, M&A intermediation, and media businesses. It operates in the mail order business of nursing care products; and provides M&A support services for nursing care business. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9275.T.summary: NARUMIYA INTERNATIONAL Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, processes, and sells children's clothing and related products. The company offers clothes for babies, toddlers, and juniors. It also provides logistics management and purchasing of products; packaging and shipment services, including assortment; and products storage, management, transportation, and logistics services. The company offers its products under the ANNA SUI mini, kate spade new york childrenswear, mezzo piano, X-girl Stages, XLARGE KIDS, kladskap, petit main, b.ROOM, sense of wonder, Love & Peace & Money, baby cheer, Sophie la giraffe, Pupil House, Lovetoxic, mezzo piano junior, pom ponette junior, Lindsay, BLUECROSS girls, by LOVEiT, BLUE CROSS, and petit main LIEN brands. As of February 28, 2019, it operated 769 stores in Japan. The company also offers its products online. The company was formerly known as NI Corporation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NARUMIYA INTERNATIONAL Co., Ltd. in September 1995. NARUMIYA INTERNATIONAL Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9278.T.summary: Bookoff Group Holdings Limited operates secondhand book and other goods stores in the Japan, Malaysia, the United States, and France. The company's BOOKOFF branded stores purchases and sells preowned goods, such as books, software, home appliances, apparel, sporting and baby goods, watches, luxury brand bags, precious metals, kitchenware, and other household items, as well as trading cards, used mobile phones, and other private brand products. It also operates BOOKOFF online e-commerce Website, which sells books, software, and other merchandise; and trades in books, CDs, DVDs, and games, as well as operates a book review community site. As of June 30, 2019, the company operated 807 stores. Bookoff Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Sagamihara, Japan.

9279.T.summary: Gift Inc. operates restaurants in Japan and Singapore. Its restaurants offer noodles, sauces, and soups. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Machida, Japan.

9376.T.summary: Eurasia Travel Co., Ltd. provides travel agency services in Japan and internationally. It offers travel planning and arrangement services, as well as engages in overseas travel insurance business. The company serves individuals, corporations, and groups. Eurasia Travel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9385.T.summary: Shoei Corporation engages in the planning, manufacture, and sale of plastic films and packaging materials in Japan. It also provides planning services related to shipping of direct mail, catalogs, etc.; and plans and sells daily miscellaneous goods. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

9444.T.summary: Toshin Holdings Co.,Ltd. engages in the mobile communication related business in Japan. It is involved in the mobile shop operation and sales, agency sales, shop management consignment, and corporate sales businesses. The company also acquires, develops, manages, and rents condominiums and office buildings. In addition, it engages in the golf course management; selling drinking water; managing and renting conference rooms; selling OA equipment and air conditioners; and managing golfer's salon. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

9603.T.summary: H.I.S. Co., Ltd. provides travel agency services worldwide. The company offers sports related tours, such as ski and diving tours; casual to luxury cruises; escort accompanied tours, honeymoons, and onboard weddings; and local tour services in Australia, Bali Island, Guam, Thailand, and South Korea. It also operates hotels and theme parks, as well as provides airline tickets. In addition, the company offers business trips and various tours; and overseas travel insurance products. It operates a network of 276 retail outlets in 157 cities in 70 countries. The company was formerly known as International Tours Co., Ltd. and changed its name to H.I.S. Co., Ltd. in 1990. H.I.S. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

9616.T.summary: Kyoritsu Maintenance Co., Ltd. operates dormitories for students and companies. It also supplies meals for students; operates hotels under the Dormy Inn name, as well as spring and resort hotels; and offers housing for senior citizens. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9656.T.summary: Greenland Resort Company Limited engages in the tourism and inn businesses in Japan. The company manages amusement parks, golf courses, and sports facilities. It is also involved in restaurant management and real estate businesses. The company was formerly known as Greenland Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Greenland Resort Company Limited in July 2006. Greenland Resort Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Arao, Japan.

9672.T.summary: Tokyotokeiba Co.,Ltd. engages in the rental of horse racing facilities in Japan. It is involved in the rental of auto racetracks; management of an amusement park; and rental of warehouse facilities, as well as commercial facilities. The company also provides construction management services; and maintenance services for air conditioning equipment, as well as manages and operates shopping mall and office building. In addition, it operates restaurants and parking lots. Tokyotokeiba Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9675.T.summary: Joban Kosan Co.,Ltd. engages in the tourism, trading, manufacturing, and transportation businesses in Japan and internationally. It is involved in the operation of resort under the Spa Resort Hawaiians name; and Spa Resort Hawaiians golf course. The company also engages in the wholesale of imported coal; heavy oil, and LP gas; kerosene, gasoline, light oil, lubricating oil, and petrochemical products; wood pellets; and construction materials, such as cement, ready-mixed concrete, etc. In addition, it manufactures cast iron products, such as hydrostar motors that are used in the marine equipment and industrial machinery; and hydraulic motor body, as well as provides cargo transportation services. The company was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Iwaki, Japan.

9695.T.summary: The Kamogawa Grand Hotel, Ltd. engages in hotel and resort related businesses in Japan. The company was formerly known as Yoshidaya Ryokan, Ltd. and changed its name to The Kamogawa Grand Hotel, Ltd. in 1965. The Kamogawa Grand Hotel, Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Kamogawa, Japan.

9701.T.summary: Tokyo Kaikan Co., Ltd. operates restaurants, bars, and banquet halls in Japan. It also operates boutiques, galleries, and a cooking school; provides wedding services; and sells gifts, such as confectionery, retortable items, etc. The company was founded in 1911 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9704.T.summary: AGORA Hospitality Group Co., Ltd operates in the hotel and property development activities in Japan. The company operates various hotels, including full service, limited service, resort, and traditional ryokans type hotels. It also provides hospitality management, operation and asset management, due diligence and renewal project, and repositioning and rebranding planning services. The company was formerly known as Tokai Kanko Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AGORA Hospitality Group Co., Ltd in April 2012. AGORA Hospitality Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9720.T.summary: Hotel Newgrand Co.,Ltd. engages in the hotel and resorts businesses in Japan. It operates the Hotel New Grand in Yokohama. The company was incorporated in 1926 and is based in Yokohama, Japan.

9722.T.summary: Fujita Kanko Inc. operates as a tourism company in Japan and East Asia. It operates hotels, wedding and banquet venues, restaurants, and resorts, as well as leisure facilities, such as theme parks, aquariums, and golf courses. The company also offers supplementary services, including hotel room cleaning, flower provision and arrangement, garden care and landscaping, and photography. In addition, it provides management services for resorts and urban condominiums, and property management services for land to be used for building villas. Fujita Kanko Inc. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9723.T.summary: The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd. operates accommodation, banquet, restaurant, and other facilitates in Japan. The company operates hotels under the Karasuma Kyoto Hotel and Kyoto Hotel Okura names. The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd. was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

9726.T.summary: KNT-CT Holdings Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides travel services in Japan. It also sells airline tickets; and offers reinsurance underinsurance products. The company was formerly known as Kinki Nippon Tourist Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KNT-CT Holdings Co., Ltd. in January 2013. KNT-CT Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. KNT-CT Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Kintetsu Group Holdings Co.,Ltd.

9731.T.summary: Hakuyosha Company, Ltd. engages in cleaning, rental, and other businesses in Japan. The company cleans general clothing items, fur, leather, shoes, difficult-to-handle kimono, and bags; and interior items, such as curtains, carpets, and futons, as well as offers house cleaning for including kitchens and bathrooms. It also rents uniforms to restaurants and factories; and linen, including sheets and towels, as well as tablecloths to restaurants. In addition, the company cleans theaters, halls, offices, and shops; and building exterior tiles, lighting fixtures, and carpets as well as provides pest control services. Hakuyosha Company, Ltd. was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9734.T.summary: Kabushiki Kaisha Seiyoken operates restaurants in Japan. Its restaurants offer hayashi rice, beef stew, and kamoba royal puddingThe company was founded in 1872 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9827.T.summary: Lilycolor Co., Ltd. plans, develops, and sells interior products in Japan. It offers wallpapers, custom curtains, and floorings under the Lilycala brand name to interior specialty stores, department stores, daily carpentry stores, accessory stores, housing manufacturers, design offices, construction companies, etc. The company is also involved in the design, construction, and project management of facilities and office spaces, as well as undertakes renovation and construction contracts for lodging, medical, and commercial facilities. The company was formerly known as Kawakichi Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lilycolor Co., Ltd. in 1989. Lilycolor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9828.T.summary: Genki Sushi Co., Ltd. operates and manages a chain of sushi stores in Japan, Hong Kong, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers its products under the Uobei, Genki Sushi, and Senryo brands. It operates approximately 140 stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Utsunomiya, Japan.

9829.T.long_name: Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd.
9829.T.summary: Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. engages in the department stores business in Japan. The company was formerly known as Nagano Maruzen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. in September 1970. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan. Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of TOKYU DEPARTMENT STORE CO.,LTD.

9831.T.summary: Yamada Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the reuse and recycling of used home appliances in Japan. The company operates through five segments: Housing, Environmental Resources Development, Finance, Services, and Consumer Electronics. It provides house renovation services; and financial products, including mortgages, non-life insurance products, life planning, and payment services. The company also offers its products online. It operates approximately 12,858 stores. The company was formerly known as Yamada Denki Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yamada Holdings Co., Ltd. in October 2020. Yamada Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Takasaki, Japan.

9832.T.summary: Autobacs Seven Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of retail stores for automotive goods and services in Japan and internationally. It operates through Domestic AUTOBACS Business; Overseas Business; Car Dealer, BtoB and Internet Business; and Other segments. The company's activities include wholesale and retail of automotive related goods, as well as their installation services. It also purchases and sells cars; and provides services, including car maintenance and inspection, body repairing and painting, etc. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 489 AUTOBACS stores, 74 Super AUTOBACS stores, 6 AUTOBACS Secohan Ichiba stores, 11 AUTOBACS Express stores, and 3 AUTOBACS CARS stores, as well 45 overseas stores. It also operates an online store. The company was formerly known as Fuji-Syokai Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Autobacs Seven Co., Ltd. in March 1980. Autobacs Seven Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9835.T.summary: Juntendo Co.,Ltd. develops and operates home centers, drug stores, and book centers. The company's home centers offer agricultural and gardening materials, DIY products, leisure and sports supplies, cars, pet supplies, etc.; drug stores provide medicines, health foods, daily necessities, and cosmetics; and book centers offer books, CDs, DVDs, stationery, miscellaneous goods, etc. It also rents CDs and DVDs. The company was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Masuda, Japan.

9837.T.summary: Morito Co., Ltd. plans, develops, and produces eyelets, hooks, flat fasteners, and other apparels worldwide. It also provides footwear accessories and articles, as well as materials for camera components and vehicle interiors. In addition, the company offers various categories of footwear materials; and value added materials for various types of apparel, including casualwear, sportswear, formalwear, and uniforms. Further, it is involved in the retail distribution of insoles and shoe/foot care articles; and provision of transportation equipment materials, such as nets, emblems, fasteners, straps, rubber textiles, and magic tape products for automobile, train, and aircraft parts, as well as ODM materials comprising sewn, molded, or other processed articles in the form of semi-finished and finished products for various industries. The company was formerly known as Morito & Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Morito Co., Ltd. in 1976. Morito Co., Ltd. was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

9842.T.summary: Arcland Sakamoto Co.,Ltd. develops and manages home centers in Japan. The company offers daily necessities; pet and gardening supplies; building and agricultural materials; art materials, calligraphy, pottery, and stained glasses; and stationery, health, beauty and care products, etc. It also operates supermarkets, restaurants, and drug stores; operates an online shop for home improvement products; and supplies work tools, gardening supplies, and houseware supplies to home centers. In addition, the company is involved in remodeling and exterior business. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Sanjo, Japan.

9843.T.summary: Nitori Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, retails furniture and interior products in Japan, China, Taiwan, and the United States. The company also provides non-life and life insurance products; logistics services; and advertising and public relations support services. Nitori Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9850.T.summary: Gourmet Kineya Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of restaurants. The company was formerly known as Ryogoku Foods Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gourmet Kineya Co.,Ltd. in September 1986. Gourmet Kineya Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

9853.T.summary: Ginza Renoir Co., Ltd. manages and franchises a chain of restaurants in Japan. It operates restaurants under the Tea room Renoir, Cafe Renoir, Cafe Miyama, NEW YORKER'S Cafe, New Style !!, NEW YORKER'S Cafe, Ruyuno Coffee, My Space & Plaza, Miyama coffee, and BLENZ COFFEE brands. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9854.T.summary: Aigan Co.,Ltd. develops and operates a chain of eyeglasses specialty stores in Japan. The company offers eyeglasses, sunglasses, and other related products. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 228 optician stores and 3 photo studios. The company was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

9861.T.summary: Yoshinoya Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, owns and operates restaurants worldwide. The company was founded in 1899 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9873.T.summary: KFC Holdings Japan, Ltd. operates restaurants in Japan. Its stores provide handmade fried chicken. The company was formerly known as Kentucky Fried Chicken Japan, Ltd. and changed its name to KFC Holdings Japan, Ltd. in 2014. KFC Holdings Japan, Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

9876.T.summary: Cox Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, manufacturing, and selling of clothing and miscellaneous products in Japan. The company offers men's, women's, and children clothing under the Ikka, LBC, VENCE EXCHANGE, CURRENT, notch, 8marbull, NO NEED, and Candy Beans brands. As of February 28, 2020, it operated a network of 222 stores. The company was formerly known as Emizu Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Cox Co., Ltd. in December 1984. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Cox Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Aeon Co., Ltd.

9878.T.summary: SEKIDO Co., Ltd. operates fashion stores. The company's stores offer bags, wallets, watches, and jewelry products. It operates 11 directly managed stores. SEKIDO Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9885.T.summary: Charle Co.,Ltd. engages in the sale of apparel, cosmetics, health foods, etc. It primarily sells women's underwear, innerwear, and leg knits, as well as men's and kids clothing; and skin, body, and hair care products. The company sells its products through mail order and door-to-door channels. Charle Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

9887.T.summary: Matsuya Foods Holdings Co., Ltd. owns and operates restaurants in Japan, China, and Taiwan. It operates beef-on-rice and set meals chains; and pork cutlet, sushi, and Chinese noodle restaurants, as well as provides restaurant technology and management instructions to franchise stores. The company also engages in the kitchen equipment maintenance, construction supervision, water supply, drainage construction, and cleaning activities; and sale of sanitary detergents. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 1193 restaurants. The company was formerly known as Matsuya Foods Co., Ltd. Matsuya Foods Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Musashino, Japan.

9900.T.summary: Sagami Holdings Corporation operates a chain of Japanese cuisine/noodle restaurants in Japan and internationally. It operates restaurants under the Sagami, Ajino-Mingei, Don Don An, Aiso-Ya, SUIZAN, Seimen-Daigaku, JINJIN, SAGAMI-Tei, Dela Pasta Kitchen, BINMUGI, HAMACHO, BUBUKA, KATSUTANI, and SAGAMI Milano Centrale names. The company also manufactures, processes, and sells noodles, cut vegetables, and beverages; manages franchise and overseas outlets; and manufactures, imports, exports, and sells food and restaurant related materials. In addition, the company is involved in the menu development. Sagami Holdings Corporation was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

9903.T.summary: Kanseki Co., Ltd. manages home centers, specialty stores, and related business in Japan. The company operates pet stores that offer a range of dogs, cats, birds and other animals, goldfishes, tropical fishes, and breeding equipment. It also operates supermarkets that include seasonings, canned foods, beverages, livestock processed goods, miscellaneous goods, and frozen food products; and off house stores that offer furniture, home appliances, interior goods, gifts, household goods, clothing, sporting goods, etc. In addition, the company operates Wildburn, a hamburger and pasta shop. It operates 75 stores under Home Center Kanseki and WILD-1. The company was formerly known as Hattori Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kanseki Co., Ltd. in December 1976. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Utsunomiya, Japan.

9904.T.summary: Verite Co., Ltd. operates a chain of jewelry stores under the Vrit, Maharaja, Velicia, and MiMiKaZaRi brands in Japan. Its stores offer jewelry, gems, precious metals, watches, and fashion goods. The company was formerly known as Jewel Verite Ohkubo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Verite Co., Ltd. in August 2005. Verite Co., Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan. Verite Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jewel Source Japan Holdings Co. Ltd.

9936.T.summary: Ohsho Food Service Corp. operates and franchises a chain of Chinese restaurants under the Gyoza OHSHO brand in Japan. As of March 31, 2019, it had a network of 516 directly operated and 213 franchised outlets. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

9942.F.summary: Joyfull Co., Ltd. operates a chain of family restaurants in Japan. The company's restaurants offer meals, hamburgers, snacks, desserts, alcoholic beverages, and others. As of May 31, 2018, it operated 801 Joyful stores. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Oita, Japan.

9945.T.summary: Plenus Company Limited engages in the food business in Japan and internationally. It operates and franchises restaurant chains under the Hotto Motto, YAYOI, Yayoiken, and MK RESTAURANT names. The company also engages in the sale of foodstuffs and packaging materials; development, sale, and maintenance of IT systems for the food-service industry; research, development, production, and sale of various seasonings and processed foods; and processing and sale of marine products. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 2,909 shops, including 1,161 directly managed shops and 1,748 franchised shops. The company was formerly known as Taiyo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Plenus Company Limited in December 1990. Plenus Company Limited was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Fukuoka City, Japan.

9946.T.summary: MINISTOP Co., Ltd. develops and franchises a chain of convenience stores under the MINISTOP name. The company also engages in the food manufacturing and supply business. As of October 31, 2020, it operated 5,304 stores, including 1,999 stores in Japan and 3,305 stores internationally. MINISTOP Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

9948.T.summary: ARCS Company Limited operates eight supermarkets in Japan. The company is also involved in building maintenance, insurance, resource environment, home improvement, and travel businesses. ARCS Company Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.

9950.T.summary: Hachi-Ban Co., Ltd. engages in the restaurant management business. The company also produces and sells food products, and soups and extracts; and sells, imports, and exports foods and seasonings. In addition, it is involved in the restaurant franchise and property letting business. As of January 21, 2021, it operated 134 stores in Japan and 144 stores internationally. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Kanazawa, Japan.
